updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services from #Newton towards #MarinaSouthPier have resumed. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[NSL] UPDATE: Fault cleared. Free regular bus services are still available between #Newton & #RafflesPlace.
[NSL]UPDATE:Fault cleared,trains are progressively returning to normal speed.
[NSL]:Due to a train fault,pls add 30mins travel time from Newton to MarinaSouthPier towards MarinaSouthPier.Trn service is still available.
